• 4 rows × 4 columns = 16 cells
• Rows: AB (Gray code: 00, 01, 11, 10)
• Columns: CD (Gray code: 00, 01, 11, 10)
• Each cell = one minterm
• Wrap-around: left↔right AND top↔bottom

Full row groups (4 cells each):

• Row 00: Ā B̄
• Row 01: Ā B
• Row 11: A B
• Row 10: A B̄

A full row eliminates C and D.

Full column groups (4 cells each):

• Column 00: C̄ D̄
• Column 01: C̄ D
• Column 11: C D
• Column 10: C D̄

A full column eliminates A and B.

Four corners: m0, m2, m8, m10

    1 - - 1
    - - - -
    - - - -
    1 - - 1

Wrap-around in BOTH directions!
Term: B̄ D̄

⚠️ Always check this group!

8-cell groups (half the map):

• Top 2 rows (00, 01): Ā
• Bottom 2 rows (11, 10): A... wait, these are non-adjacent!
• Left 2 cols (00, 01): C̄... no, 00+10 are the left wrap

Actually:
• Rows 00+01: A varies weird, actually Ā for top
• Cols 00+01: D̄ (wait, 00 and 01 differ in D)

Need to verify: Adjacent pairs in Gray code.

Each cell has exactly 4 neighbors:
• Left neighbor
• Right neighbor
• Top neighbor
• Bottom neighbor

Including wrap-around!

Example: m0's neighbors are m1, m2, m4, m8

A prime implicant is a maximal group:
• Cannot be combined with another group
• Represents largest possible simplification

Essential Prime Implicant:
• Covers at least one minterm uniquely
• MUST be in final expression

1. Fill map with 1s at minterm positions
2. Find groups of 8 (if any)
3. Find groups of 4 (rows, cols, squares, corners)
4. Find groups of 2 for remaining 1s
5. Identify essential prime implicants
6. Add minimum additional groups for coverage
7. Write SOP: OR all group terms
